heroSection.welcome: Welcome to the Japanese Language Learning Support Website! This is a project of Ton Duc Thang University developed by Le Duy Khanh and Nguyen Dinh Minh Khoi!
heroSection.point1: Confidently learn Japanese: Learn with us to solidify knowledge and develop your Japanese language skills.
heroSection.point2: Interactive learning via Zoom/Google Meet: Join online classes with instructors and a diverse community of learners.
heroSection.point3: Flexible learning anytime, anywhere: Utilize our online learning app on all devices.
heroSection.point4: Diverse program offerings: Catering to learners of all levels from beginners to experienced individuals, including exam preparation, review sessions, and various learning journeys.
heroSection.point5: Experienced teaching team: Our instructors all hold N2 Japanese language certifications and are available to support you throughout your learning journey.
heroSection.conclusion: Join us to explore Japanese language learning effectively and easily!

footer.disclaimer: This site is dedicated to all aspiring students of the Japanese language. We strive to provide the most comprehensive and engaging learning experience.

features.mainTitle: What can you do in KK website?

communityInsights.title: Community Insights
communityInsights.text: Explore a hub where students and educators share insights, tips, and cultural snippets about learning Japanese, from language tricks to cultural nuances.

comprehensiveLearning.title: Comprehensive Learning
comprehensiveLearning.text: Access a wealth of resources for every JLPT level (N5-N1), covering vocabulary, grammar, kanji, listening, reading, and quizzes to track your progress.

senseiConnect.title: Sensei Connect
senseiConnect.text: Connect with experienced instructors for immediate guidance on your Japanese language queries and enhance your learning experience with personal advice.

pronunciationPractice.title: Pronunciation Practice
pronunciationPractice.text: Use our interactive tool to practice and perfect your Japanese pronunciation, with real-time feedback to help pinpoint and correct your linguistic nuances.

infographic.title: Embark on the Journey to Master Japanese like a Native

1.bodyText: Determine your motivation and objectives for learning Japanese. Having clear goals will keep you focused and motivated throughout your journey.

2.bodyText: Master the basic Japanese writing systems - Hiragana and Katakana. These are the foundation for reading and writing in Japanese.

3.bodyText: Begin with Japanese pronunciation and common words to build your language foundation.

4.bodyText: Learn fundamental grammar concepts such as sentence structure and basic particles (は, の, が, へ, で, と, も).

5.bodyText: Understand Japanese culture, customs, and etiquette to enhance your language understanding and cultural sensitivity.

6.bodyText: Start learning kanji characters, beginning with common ones used in daily life.

7.bodyText: Increase your vocabulary with a focus on everyday conversation and topics of interest.

8.bodyText: Study more complex grammar structures, including different verb forms, conditionals, and honorific language (keigo).

9.bodyText: Practice listening comprehension and engage in speaking practice with native speakers or language exchange partners.

10.bodyText: Start reading simple Japanese texts, like children's books, manga, or graded readers, and gradually move on to more complex materials.

11.bodyText: Continue learning kanji characters, focusing on more advanced characters used in newspapers and literature.

12.bodyText: Expand your vocabulary to discuss complex topics, both formal and informal.

13.bodyText: Master advanced grammar structures, including complex sentence structures and rhetorical devices.

14.bodyText: Immerse yourself in Japanese culture through media, movies, music, and literature. Develop a deeper understanding of cultural nuances.

15.bodyText: Prepare for real-life situations in Japan by learning travel-related vocabulary and practicing common tasks.

jlptJourney.title: Embark on Your Journey to JLPT Mastery: A Path to Unleash Your Full Potential

basic.title: Basic Japanese
points: Introduction to Japanese scripts: Hiragana and Katakana.
Basic greetings and everyday expressions.
Introduction to Japanese culture and etiquette.
Basic sentence structure and simple phrases.
Numbers, dates, and basic counting.

N5.title: JLPT N5 - Beginner
points: Understand and use typical expressions and basic phrases.
Introduction to Kanji characters.
Ability to engage in simple conversation.
Understand and use basic grammar including particles.
Listening comprehension of slow and articulated speech.

N4.title: JLPT N4 - Lower Intermediate
points: Comprehend and use basic Kanji.
Understanding of basic everyday topics.
Ability to read and understand passages on familiar daily topics.
Enhanced listening skills with the ability to comprehend and respond.
Foundation for more advanced Japanese grammar.

N3.title: JLPT N3 - Intermediate
points: Deepen understanding of intermediate grammar.
Comprehend more complex Kanji and vocabulary.
Ability to understand and participate in coherent conversations.
Read and comprehend detailed texts on a variety of topics.
Improved listening comprehension in different situations.

N2.title: JLPT N2 - Upper Intermediate
points: Command of a broad vocabulary and complex grammar.
Read and comprehend newspapers and magazines.
Understand spoken Japanese in TV dramas and news.
Express and understand complex ideas and hypothetical scenarios.
Cultural nuances and idiomatic expressions.

N1.title: JLPT N1 - Advanced
points: Advanced comprehension of Japanese used in a variety of circumstances.
Read and understand complex written materials on abstract topics.
Comprehend spoken Japanese in academic and professional settings.
Ability to understand nuanced and implicit meanings.
Express ideas logically and coherently in spoken and written form.

description: Learn the Japanese alphabet (Hiragana and Katakana).
Understand basic Japanese used in everyday situations.
Learn simple sentences and common expressions.
Build on N5 knowledge with basic grammar.
Gain a deeper understanding of grammar and vocabulary.
Understand Japanese used in everyday scenarios.
Comprehend more intricate and abstract content.
Achieve the highest level of Japanese proficiency.

errorMessage.emptyEmailUsername: Email or username cannot be empty.
errorMessage.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long and less than 32 characters.

error.usernameInvalid: Username must start with a letter, contain only lowercase alphanumeric characters, and be between 8-32 characters.
error.passwordComplexity: Password must be 8-32 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, number, and a special character.

error.usernameInvalidFormat: Username must start with a letter and contain only lowercase alphanumeric characters.
error.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 8 characters long.
error.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
error.passwordNoUppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter.
error.passwordNoLowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter.
error.passwordNoNumber: Password must include at least one number.
error.passwordNoSpecialChar: Password must include at least one special character.
error.displayNameInvalid: Display name must be a string.
